title: Emma Gonzalez and Matt Deitsch Disarm Tensions with The March for Our Lives
itunes:title: Emma Gonzalez and Matt Deitsch Disarm Tensions with The March for Our Lives
description:
March For Our Lives organizers Emma Gonzalez and Matt Deitsch recall some of the safety concerns and direct threats they've faced from counterprotesters.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
